lead_paragraph: OTTAWA, April 1 -- Sixty thousand Polish troops recruited from among prisoners and refugees in Russia have crossed the frontier into Iran to strengthen the United Nations defense there, General Wladyslaw Sikorski, Polish Premier and Commander in Chief, said here today when he left Ottawa after a one-day visit.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICAN, BALKAN AND NEAR EAST FRONT
